summary: Phineas and Ferb build an enormous beach in their backyard, complete with palm trees, a pier, and water activities, which attracts the whole neighborhood. Meanwhile, Candace tries to expose them to their mom, but her attempts are foiled repeatedly. Perry the Platypus, Agent P, is busy dealing with evil schemes by Dr. Doofenshmirtz, including his attempt to deflate all the tires at the Jefferson County Motor Speedway. The episode features a variety of songs, including "Summer Belongs to You" and "Backyard Beach", and concludes with Phineas and Ferb's beach party coming to an end, but not before Candace's mom gets a glimpse of the incredible beach.

0:12:40.960000 --> 0:12:43.060060

0:12:43.360050 --> 0:12:46.660030

0:12:47.360050 --> 0:12:49.060060

Check it out.

0:13:02.720030 --> 0:13:05.140000
Can me and the other fireside girls be lifeguards?

0:13:05.360050 --> 0:13:07.140000
We need to earn our aquatic safety badges.

0:13:07.420040 --> 0:13:07.660030
Sure.

0:13:07.660030 --> 0:13:13.540040
I mean, I've been a friend of Susie's longer than Katie, so I should have invited her to that party first.

0:13:13.760000 --> 0:13:19.100040
Who cares? They're lab partners. We're locker neighbors, and locker neighbors come to lab partners any day.

0:13:19.460000 --> 0:13:20.800050
Sorry, Susie. Gotta go.

0:13:21.580000 --> 0:13:23.260000
Welcome to our beach.

0:13:24.160030 --> 0:13:28.560060
You call that a beach? This is way below your usual standard.

0:13:29.060060 --> 0:13:31.220030
This isn't even worth a call to mom.

0:13:31.820000 --> 0:13:37.060060
You know, if you guys ever want to be popular, you're going to have to stop playing in the sandbox.

0:13:37.660030 --> 0:13:38.300050
Hey!

0:13:41.960000 --> 0:13:44.200000
So, Candace, what do you think?

0:13:44.300050 --> 0:13:44.880000
That's it.

0:13:45.240000 --> 0:13:46.880000
I'm calling Mom.

0:13:47.380000 --> 0:13:48.260000
Hey, Candace.

0:13:48.580000 --> 0:13:48.840000
Jenny?

0:13:49.260000 --> 0:13:49.540040
Cece?

0:13:49.540040 --> 0:13:51.860050
You never told us you had a beach in your backyard.

0:13:52.120000 --> 0:13:53.900000
You're going to be the most popular girl in the neighborhood.

0:13:54.120000 --> 0:13:54.460000
I will?

0:13:54.700000 --> 0:13:56.540040
I just saw Jeremy and his buddies with their surfboards.

0:13:57.420040 --> 0:13:57.880000
Jeremy's here?

0:13:58.160030 --> 0:13:58.880000
Gotta go.

0:14:03.340000 --> 0:14:04.520000
Oh, yes.

0:14:04.980040 --> 0:14:05.320000
Yes.

0:14:05.320000 --> 0:14:08.020000
Just look at my bounty of gnome riches.

0:14:08.740000 --> 0:14:10.260000
Oh, this is a strange one.

0:14:11.120000 --> 0:14:12.400000
Wait, who are you?

0:14:13.020000 --> 0:14:14.220030
A platypus?

0:14:15.400000 --> 0:14:16.840000
Perry the platypus?

0:14:17.360050 --> 0:14:18.980040
You are mine now!

0:14:21 --> 0:14:22.040040
Oh, no, wait, wait, wait.

0:14:22.140000 --> 0:14:23.680050
It was the garage door opening.

0:14:23.760000 --> 0:14:25.440060
You are mine now!

0:14:26.540040 --> 0:14:28.420040
And that was the TV remote.

0:14:28.600040 --> 0:14:30.500000
I've got to start labeling these things.

0:14:30.620000 --> 0:14:32.360050
Aha! You are mine now!

0:14:32.360050 --> 0:14:39.260000
Finally, I will rid myself of you

0:14:39.260000 --> 0:14:43.040040
But first, turn your attention to the giant screen

0:14:43.040040 --> 0:14:47.860050
Maybe I need to turn the cable on first?

0:14:49.640000 --> 0:14:51.740000
Let's get this beef party started

0:14:51.740000 --> 0:14:56.580000
Well, we wake up early and wash our surfboards down

0:14:56.580000 --> 0:14:58.340000
Don't you know what it's like?

0:14:58.480040 --> 0:15:02.080000
We throw our boards your turn and head for surfing.

0:15:02.740000 --> 0:15:05.300050
Hey, look! I can see our house from up here!

0:15:18.820000 --> 0:15:22.560060
How low can you go? How low can you go?

0:15:22.780000 --> 0:15:23.180050
Look!

0:15:26.580000 --> 0:15:28.480040
So that's how low you can go.

0:15:28.800050 --> 0:15:30.580000
Even asking that question for generations.

0:15:30.920040 --> 0:15:32.380000
What? What's that great looking at?

0:15:32.560060 --> 0:15:38.380000
For winning the limbo contest, you are now officially crowned Queen Wahine of the Beach.

0:15:38.780000 --> 0:15:40.980040
All hail Queen Wahine!

0:15:41.900000 --> 0:15:44.820070
I can't believe it!

0:15:45.620000 --> 0:15:47.540040
Listen up, people in the beach.

0:15:47.860000 --> 0:15:50.720030
I'm Phineas and Ferb and I'll back your nature.

0:15:51.100040 --> 0:15:55.400000
Every morning, Phineas is gonna say, brother, what you gonna do today?

0:15:55.400000 --> 0:15:58.120000
Now you see we're having fun playing under the sun

0:15:58.120000 --> 0:15:59.480040
And getting nine, getting nine

0:15:59.480040 --> 0:16:00.860000
Cause the rest keeps running

0:16:00.860000 --> 0:16:03.240000
A backyard beach, a backyard beach

0:16:03.240000 --> 0:16:05.760000
Nothing's out to reach, we got the backyard beach

0:16:05.760000 --> 0:16:07.300050
You can change in the broken height

0:16:07.300050 --> 0:16:08.380000
Drink out of a coconut

0:16:08.380000 --> 0:16:10.800050
Three games for a token, but the rest is free

0:16:10.800050 --> 0:16:12.240000
You got Dee and Sarah sailing

0:16:12.240000 --> 0:16:13.400000
Surfing in the tail

0:16:13.400000 --> 0:16:14.720030
And you got taxi sailing

0:16:14.720030 --> 0:16:15.860000
The rest you can't see

0:16:15.860000 --> 0:16:18.420040
That's a backyard beach, a backyard beach

0:16:18.420040 --> 0:16:20.920040
Nothing's out to reach, we got the backyard beach

0:16:20.920040 --> 0:16:23.420040
That's a backyard beach, a backyard beach

0:16:23.420040 --> 0:16:24.720030
Don't fall into the breach

0:16:24.720030 --> 0:16:26.020000
Got the backyard beach.

0:16:27.060060 --> 0:16:30.620000
I've never been happier in my entire life.

0:16:31.340000 --> 0:16:32.680050
Something is very wrong.

0:16:33.220030 --> 0:16:35.160030
Not a single call from Candace.

0:16:35.480040 --> 0:16:36.700000
Not even a text message.

0:16:37.040040 --> 0:16:38.240000
Olga, hose me down.

0:16:38.360000 --> 0:16:39
I'm going home.

0:16:39.140000 --> 0:16:40.860000
Okay, I think I finally got the right one.

0:16:41.440060 --> 0:16:46.480040
Now, Perry the Platypus, you will finally understand my pain.

0:16:48.280000 --> 0:16:58.490000
Back in Gimmelstumpf in the days of my youth the Doofenshmirtzes were a proud family But those were lean times when my father and our beloved Lorno was repossessed

0:16:58.890000 --> 0:17:02.490000
Who would protect our Zatzentruth garden from witch's spells and wood trolls?

0:17:02.950000 --> 0:17:06.770000
From a tender age, my father decided that it would be me.

0:17:06.770000 --> 0:17:14.350000
While the other children played Kippestumpf on their dunkelberries, I would stand for hours.

0:17:14.350000 --> 0:17:17.850000
All through the cold night

0:17:17.850000 --> 0:17:19.570100
As the Spitzenhound howled

0:17:19.570100 --> 0:17:22.650000
My only companion was the moon

0:17:22.650000 --> 0:17:24.130000
And my neighbor, Kenny

0:17:24.130000 --> 0:17:28.550000
And since my lawn gnome was taken away from me

0:17:28.550000 --> 0:17:34.850000
I will destroy every lawn gnome in the entire tri-state area

0:17:34.850000 --> 0:17:37.850000
Behold the destruction acorn

0:17:37.850000 --> 0:17:40.330000
And now, Perry the Platypus

0:17:40.330000 --> 0:17:42.670000
To activate my creation

0:17:42.670000 --> 0:17:48.990000
Surf contest

0:17:48.990000 --> 0:17:51.370000
Out of my way, Jenna Bell

0:17:51.370000 --> 0:17:52.270000
Hello, Buford

0:17:52.270000 --> 0:17:53.510000
Perhaps you missed the sun

0:17:53.510000 --> 0:17:55.590000
No bullying, no yodeling

0:17:55.590000 --> 0:17:57.630000
I don't like this any more than you do

0:17:57.630000 --> 0:18:00.050000
First up in the surf contest, Bobby Nelson

0:18:00.050000 --> 0:18:02.210000
Oh, and Nelson eats it on a five-footer

0:18:02.210000 --> 0:18:04.050000
And there's Django Brown shooting the curl

0:18:04.050000 --> 0:18:05.890000
And here comes Buford Von Starr

0:18:05.890000 --> 0:18:09.370000
Oh, he pummels Brown with a Philadelphia traffic star

0:18:09.370000 --> 0:18:10.590000
And now he's got him in a half, Nelson

0:18:10.590000 --> 0:18:11.570100
Now a full Nelson

0:18:11.910000 --> 0:18:14.470000
Oh, and now he's actually beating him with Bobby Nelson.

0:18:14.810000 --> 0:18:17.870000
Here's the scores from our judges, and Buford doesn't like it one bit.

0:18:18.370000 --> 0:18:19.890000
Next up is Phineas Flynn.

0:18:20.070100 --> 0:18:22.430000
It is great to see a young surfer show such confidence.

0:18:22.790000 --> 0:18:23.770000
Uh-oh, what's this?

0:18:24.330000 --> 0:18:27.050000
Oh, those kids today and their holographic projections.

0:18:27.630000 --> 0:18:28.310000
He's in the pipeline.

0:18:28.590000 --> 0:18:29.350000
Now he's hanging 10.

0:18:29.530000 --> 0:18:30.310000
He's hanging 20.

0:18:30.510000 --> 0:18:31.690100
He's hanging 32.

0:18:32.030000 --> 0:18:33.110000
Now he's just hanging.

0:18:33.430000 --> 0:18:34.410000
The crowd loves it.

0:18:34.670000 --> 0:18:36.050000
I don't think there's a name for that.

0:18:36.050000 --> 0:18:39.530000
The crowd is doing the wave, and Phineas is surfing it.

0:18:39.830000 --> 0:18:41.010000
Let's go to the judges.

0:18:41.570100 --> 0:18:50.530000
10 to the 5th power, infinity, and oh, it seems Sidious Flynn's radical serving has made judge number 3 rethink Einstein's theory of relativity.

0:18:51.190100 --> 0:18:52.610000
Cowabunga, laws of nature!

0:18:53.910000 --> 0:18:55.990000
So, are you having fun?

0:18:59.950000 --> 0:19:04.230000
Girl, the moment has arrived.

0:19:06.790000 --> 0:19:08.330100
Just one second.

0:19:09.030000 --> 0:19:09.710000
Hello?

0:19:10.550000 --> 0:19:13.030000
Um, Candace, is everything okay?

0:19:13.350000 --> 0:19:16.670000
Oh, everything is just wonderful.

0:19:17.690000 --> 0:19:20.550000
And Phineas and Ferb, what are they doing?

0:19:20.830100 --> 0:19:23.890000
Oh, such wonderful things.

0:19:25.250000 --> 0:19:26.990000
Candace, honey, I'm coming home.

0:19:27.470000 --> 0:19:28.450000
Wait, what?

0:19:28.770000 --> 0:19:30.770000
I'm right around the corner. I'll be there in two minutes.

0:19:31.030000 --> 0:19:32.630000
Wait, no, Mom, you can't.

0:19:32.970000 --> 0:19:35.170000
Oh, wait, wait. Stay right there.

0:19:35.790000 --> 0:19:36.890000
Not to stop her.

0:19:37.290000 --> 0:19:38.330100
Oh, no, no, no, no, no.

0:19:38.330100 --> 0:19:40.710000
Mom, Mom, please, Mom, go away.

0:19:40.830100 --> 0:19:41.630000
Don't come in.

0:19:52.430000 --> 0:19:53.650000
Is that Volcano?

0:19:56.830100 --> 0:19:57.350000
No!

0:20:00.350000 --> 0:20:01.850000
Run for your lives.

0:20:02.150000 --> 0:20:03.970000
It's No-Mageddon.

0:20:04.290000 --> 0:20:06.110000
Who's protecting our gardens?

0:20:06.630000 --> 0:20:08.250000
Candace, tell me the truth.

0:20:08.330100 --> 0:20:09.730000
What is going on here?

0:20:10.790000 --> 0:20:13.070100
Phineas and Ferb built a beach in the backyard just like they said they were going to,

0:20:13.150000 --> 0:20:14.730000
but instead of just a cute little beach in their sandbox,

0:20:14.910000 --> 0:20:17.010000
it turned out to be this absolutely huge beach

0:20:17.010000 --> 0:20:18.830100
with a coastline and palm trees and a pier

0:20:18.830100 --> 0:20:21.170000
and hula dancers and water skiers and cheeky heads and dolphins

0:20:21.170000 --> 0:20:23.410000
and dancing and surfing and everybody from the neighborhood showed up.

0:20:33.890000 --> 0:20:35.410000
And then I was just about to share a smoothie with Jeremy

0:20:35.410000 --> 0:20:36.950000
when a coconut dropped on my head and...

0:20:36.950000 --> 0:20:46.590000
Just for a moment, it seemed that the wily Buford would steal away the coveted surfing trophy from under the noses of our heroes?

0:20:48.670000 --> 0:20:53.850000
But I can only continue my benign reign and spread love, happiness, and ultimate popularity throughout my kingdom.

0:20:54.370000 --> 0:20:56.490000
If you would just let me have my moment.

0:21:03.030000 --> 0:21:04.530000
Oh, there you are, Perry.

0:21:04.530000 --> 0:21:08.830100
Well, everybody, looks like that's all for today

0:21:08.830100 --> 0:21:17.190000
If you don't believe me, go see for yourself

0:21:17.190000 --> 0:21:18.250000
That was great

0:21:18.250000 --> 0:21:19.010000
Hey, boys

0:21:19.010000 --> 0:21:19.590000
Hey, Mom

0:21:19.590000 --> 0:21:21.030000
So how was your day at the beach?

0:21:21.530000 --> 0:21:26.510000
Wait, wait, my kingdom, my Jeremy, it was all so beautiful

0:21:26.510000 --> 0:21:28.950000
What have you done to my paradise?

0:21:29.810000 --> 0:21:33.070100
Candace, honey, I think it's time to get you out of the sun for a little while

0:21:33.070100 --> 0:21:34.930000
I think she had fun

0:21:34.930000 --> 0:21:37.350000
It's summer only

0:21:37.350000 --> 0:21:39.810000
Lasted one day

0:21:39.810000 --> 0:21:45.990000
Thank you all here with a special shout out

0:21:45.990000 --> 0:21:48.010000
To my two new pals Phineas and Ferb

0:21:48.010000 --> 0:21:50.290000
For hosting a beach party that was hot hot hot

0:21:50.290000 --> 0:21:51.650000
And speaking of hot

0:21:51.650000 --> 0:21:53.530000
Slather on the sunscreen listeners

0:21:53.530000 --> 0:21:56.430000
Cause tomorrow's weather calls for another scorcher

0:21:56.430000 --> 0:21:58.430000
With a slight chance of scattered lawnmowers

0:21:58.430000 --> 0:22:04.150000
He's a semi-aquatic, egg-laying mammal of action

0:22:04.150000 --> 0:22:09.410000
He's a furry little fat foot who'll never flinch from a prey

0:22:09.410000 --> 0:22:13.610000
He's got more than just mad skill

0:22:13.610000 --> 0:22:16.110000
He's got a beaver tail and a bill

0:22:16.110000 --> 0:22:20.550000
And the women swoon whatever they hear him say

0:22:20.550000 --> 0:22:23.210000
He's Perry

0:22:23.210000 --> 0:22:26.610000
Perry the Platypus

0:22:28.430000 --> 0:22:58.410000
Thank you.
